1.content: On the speaker “d class 8080 please step inside the cell or you will be terminated”. “Yea yea I heard you the first 5 times”. You then head inside the cell labeled scp 625 the possession stone. The doors are then closed behind you. On the speaker again “d class 8080 please make contact with scp 625”. You then touch the stone and you feel weird you then black out. You then wake in a interlay different area. “Where am I“. you think in your head. You then look down at your body and see your not in your body anymore you are now in the body of a. What are you in the body of?
1.title: A normal test or not?

11.content: You then realize that you are now in the body of one of the many scp’s in this whole facility. But which scp have you become?
11.title: You are a scp

choices: You get fed lots of candy
A doctor tests on you to see if you can absorb scp 682 and get bigger
111.content: You then realize your body feels like the consistency of peanut butter you look down and see your body is now a formless gelato is blob of orange goo You now realize you are now possessing the body of scp 999 or known as the tickle monster https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=http... what happens next?
111.title: Scp 999

info.description: You are a d class that is at the scp foundation and you are being tested with scp 625 the body possession stone it allows the user to possess the bodies of scp’s or other humans use it wisely.
